data.title: The Quentin Tarantino Archives
data.text:
Back to: The QT Film Fest

The 4th Annual Quentin Tarantino Film Festival (aka QT Quattro) (2000)

Lists are under construction

Schedule

Friday, August 25th

Secret Agent Night - Triple Bill

HAMMERHEAD 1968

KISS THE GIRLS AND MAKE THEM DIE 1966

Midnight Feature

THE MUTHERS 1976 Dir: Cirio Santiago

Saturday, August 26th

Children's Matinee

DESTROY ALL MONSTERS 1968 Directed by Ishiro Honda. Stars Godzilla, Rodan, Mothra, Ghidorah, Godzuki--all the classic monsters. A monster lover's feast. (Preceded by cartoons).

Japanese Monster Movies & Italian Horror Films (Night)

THE MYSTERIANS 1957 Dir: Ishiro Honda

THE PSYCHIC 1977 Dir: Lucio Fulci

MOTHRA 1961 Dir: Ishiro Honda

SUSPIRIA 1977 Dir: Dario Argento

DESTROY ALL MONSTERS 1968 Dir: Ishiro Honda

GODZILLA VS. THE SMOG MONSTER 1971

Sunday, August 27th

Heist Thriller Night Triple Bill

GAMBIT 1966 Dir: Ronald Neame

THE MASTER TOUCH 1972

BONUS!!! Special Surprise!

Monday, August 28th

Sex Night

SUCCUBUS 1967 Dir: Jess Franco

SEX ON THE RUN 1976

Tuesday, August 29th

Italian 70s Crime Films Triple Bill "The most violent of all crime sub-genres; slightly more violent than John Woo." -QT

SHOOT FIRST DIE LATER

WIPEOUT! 1973 Dir: Fernando DiLeo

BONUS FILM: HICKEY & BOGGS 1972 Dir: Robert Culp

Wednesday, August 30th

Italian Epic Adventures

The Huns

Fernando Baldi: This film feels like its "coming at you."

The Giant of Metropolis, 1961 "Very cool muscleman epic that plays exactly like the Flash Gordon film." - QT

Thursday, August 31st

Spaghetti Westerns

Arizona Colt, 1966

They Call Me Hallelujah, 1972

Friday, September 1st

Big Pimpin' Friday Triple Bill

The Mack, 1973

Saint Jack, 1979

Midnight Feature

The Chinese Mack

Saturday, September 2nd

Kids Matinee

Invasion of the Neptune Men, 1961 Starring Sonny Chiba who plays superhero. "Best flying saucer attack ever." - QT

Good Ol' Boys Night

Walking Tall, 1973

Part Two Walking Tall, 1975

Walking Tall: Final Chapter, 1977

Macon County Line, 1974

Sunday, September 3rd

Go Go Go Sunday Afternoon (starting at 1pm)

Go Go Mania, 1965 Gorgeous 35mm Scope Print. Featuring performances by The Honeycombs, The Spencer Davis Group, The Animals, Tommy Quickly, Peter and Gordon, Herman's Hermits, Nashville Teens and several others, including the Beatles performing "I Wanna Hold Your Hand." Preceded by an extraordinary hour of rock 'n' roll film trailers from Elvis to Johnny Cash. "One of the cooler things at the festival." - QT

Hong Kong Sunday Night: Kung Fu Triple Bill

Dragon vs. Snakefist, 1979

Dragon vs. Needle of Death, 1982

BONUS!!! Snake Fist in Eagle Shadow, 1978

Films according to austinfilm.org

DRAGON VS SNAKEFIST (AKA SNAKE IN THE MONKEY'S SHADOW) 1979 - Dir: Sum Cheung

DRAGON VS NEEDLES OF DEATH 1982 - Dir: Mitch Wong (uncon.)

SNAKE FIST IN EAGLE SHADOW (SNAKE IN THE EAGLE'S SHADOW) 1978 - Dir: Woo-ping Yuen

WHITE LIGHTNING 1973 - Dir: Joseph Sargent

THE CHINESE MACK
